import React from 'react' import hero from '../assets/hero.png' const Hero = () => { const socialMedia= [ {link: "https://github.com/11-albert", logo: 'logo-github' }, {link: "https://www.facebook.com/syedalirazanaqvi101", logo: 'logo-facebook' }, {link: "https://www.linkedin.com/in/syed-ali-raza-naqvi-b91bb9227", logo: 'logo-linkedin' }, // {link: "", logo: 'logo-twitter' }, ] return (

Hello!
My name is Ali Raza

Fullstack Developer

{ socialMedia?.map((icon,i)=>(
)) }
) } export default Hero
